description: This story humorously depicts the literal interpretation of a doctor's advice about avoiding places where one gets hurt.
title: Misunderstood Advice
n_1: John nervously recounts his accidents to Dr. Smith.
n_3: Dr. Smith offers his unconventional advice.
n_4: John leaves, pondering the advice; Dr. Smith is amused.
c1_1: I seem to be really unlucky with these accidents.
c2_1: Hmm, tell me exactly how this happened.
c1_2: So there I was, and suddenly, bam! I hit my arm.
c1_3: Both times, right at these two places!
c2_3: Then stop going to those places!
c1_4: Maybe he's right, I should avoid those spots.
c2_4: Some patients take things too literally...
